people.name: John Smith
people.short_bio: Award-winning chef with a passion for local ingredients and seasonal cuisine.

recipes.name: Grilled salmon with lemon butter
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy seafood dish perfect for summer grilling.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper.
In a small saucepan, melt butter over low heat.
Stir in lemon juice and chopped parsley.
Brush butter mixture over salmon fillets.
Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through.

recipes.name: Roasted beet and goat cheese salad
recipes.description: A colorful and flavorful salad that's perfect for entertaining.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375째F.
Wash and trim beets, then wrap each one in foil.
Place wrapped beets on a baking sheet and roast in oven for 45-60 minutes, or until tender.
Let beets cool, then peel and dice.
In a large bowl, whisk together balsamic vinegar, olive oil, Dijon mustard, and minced garlic.
Add mixed greens to bowl and toss to coat in dressing.
Divide dressed greens between four plates.
Top with roasted beets, crumbled goat cheese, and chopped pecans.

recipes.name: Chocolate chip cookies
recipes.description: A classic dessert that's always a crowd-pleaser.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375째F.
Cream together butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla extract.
Combine flour, baking soda, and salt in a separate bowl.
Gradually add flour mixture to butter mixture and mix well.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 8-10 minutes, or until golden brown.
